categories.name: Electric Scooters
categories.note: Highest volatility and most active promos

categories.name: Noise-Canceling Headphones

watchlist.title: Entry commuter scooters (350–500W)
watchlist.why: Floors drifting down. Good value if range needs are modest

watchlist.title: Midrange scooters (500–800W)
watchlist.why: Deals appear but snap back fast. Alerts help

watchlist.title: Premium scooters (1000W+)
watchlist.why: Discounts rarer. Prices stay firm when inventory is tight

watchlist.title: Replacement batteries and chargers
watchlist.why: Accessories rising faster than scooters. Compare carefully

watchlist.title: Helmet bundles
watchlist.why: Bundles can beat standalone discounts when available

alerts.title: Kick scooter safety checks
alerts.note: Before buying used, verify exact model and any safety fixes

alerts.title: Coupon stacking risk
alerts.note: Some low prices require multiple coupons. Verify final checkout total

alerts.title: Battery capacity labeling
alerts.note: Cheapest variant may have smaller battery than the headline model
